text:
curious as to what you all do when you have a module that needs something like a checkbox set. I have a repeater of clients, and its items can fall into one or more of five industry areas. Can’t use a Choice field because there could be more than one industry area for a client…. unless i use a choice/boolean field for each area.

the ultimate intent is to filter on these industry areas, so i would prefer not to let people type things in a text field and risk a typo that skips a client
Is there a way to access the API via javascript in a module, where i don't expose any api key. I just want to be able to pull some additional content from the api?
Certain API endpoints don't need authorization. If they do, you'll need to use a proxy server or serverless function to mask the authorization keys
proxy server would seem to defeat the point, can we create serverless functions in HubSpot? I am fairly new.
Can also look at serverless functions on Firebase, Azure, AWS etc... for a lighterweight approach if you're not on CMS Enterprise
